subject: Medicine and Health
lead_paragraph: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said the league would allow anyone to anonymously report any incident in which a doctor was pressured by a team or coach to return a player to the field.
snippet: N.F.L. Commissioner Roger Goodell said the league would allow anyone to anonymously report any incident in which a doctor was pressured by a team or coach to return a player to the field.
